title: Preschool English Teacher
contract: Freelance, per lesson, by agreement, flexible
description: We are looking for a nice person to work as a teacher for a Sunday morning preschool age English class. Depending on your interest, the assignment can be extended with more lessons/days. You can start soon. Will you join us?

title: Elementary English Teacher
contract: Freelance, per lesson, by agreement, flexible
description: We are looking for a nice person to work as a teacher for a Wednesday afternoon elementary grade 1-3 English class. Depending on your interest, the assignment can be extended with more lessons/days. You can start soon. Will you join us?
